message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18000. This is a great deal, and I'm confident you won't find a better price anywhere else.

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase this unique product. However, I am only able to pay up to $12000 for it. I hope this revised offer meets your expectations.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm afraid $12000 is still a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $16000. This is a great compromise, and I'm confident you'll find it's worth the investment.

Thank you for your response, Alice. I understand your position, but unfortunately, I am unable to exceed my budget. I would like to propose a final offer of $14000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your final offer, Bob. I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still not willing to go below $16000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $15500. This is my final offer, and I'm confident it's a fair price for this unique product.

Thank you for your last offer, Alice. While I understand the value of the product, I am unable to agree to a price higher than $14000. I hope this aligns with your expectations, and I look forward to your final decision.
